title: How Microplastics in the Ocean Will Affect Marine Life - The New York Times
body: Marine snow-making Plastic waste washing up on a beach in Bali, Indonesia. Surface surveys have accounted for only about 1 percent of the ocean's estimated plastic. Agung Parameswara/Getty...
readable_content: - NYTReader (2023-12-08): The article discusses microplastics infiltrating the deep sea and altering the ocean's ancient cooling process. It also explains the concept of marine snow and how it's being affected by microplastics.
summary:
The post highlights the concerning issue of microplastics infiltrating the deep sea and disrupting the ocean's natural processes. These findings raise environmental awareness and emphasize the urgent need for sustainable solutions to address plastic pollution. 

Sentiment: 0.9
